title: Heavenly Brick Hero
overview: The aloof and proud architectural genius Li Ji was kidnapped by a creature from another world, the Dark Qilin, and taken to a secret realm called the Soul Mind Space. In this secret realm lies the ruins of an ancient heavenly court. The Dark Qilin told him that if he wants to return, he must pass the trial set by the Heavenly Dao, which is to rebuild the heavenly court...
